original_text: “When a leader sins, doing unintentionally any one of all the things that by the commandments of the Lord his God ought not to be done, and realizes his guilt,
korean_text: 만일 족장이 그의 하나님 여호와의 계명 중 하나라도 부지중에 범하여 허물이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: doing unintentionally any one of all the things
sentences.korean_translation: 무심코 여러 것 중 하나를 행하여

sentences.original_text: that by the commandments of the Lord his God
